title: Eudemon blade
data:
{{version031}} {{weapon |name = Eudemon blade |cost = ? |weight = 20.0 |skill = Long Blades |damage = 14 |accuracy = -2 |basedelay = 12 (120%) |mindelay = 6 at skill 12 |hands = 1H |size = Medium |damtype = Slicing |ranged = No |acquirement = ? }} {{flavour|A sacred blade from the forges of Heaven, inhabited by a good spirit. It is a favoured weapon of the Shining One's servants, and cannot be wielded by the forces of evil. ---- "Quemadmodum gladius neminem occidit: occidentis telum est."
"A sword by itself does not slay; it is merely the weapon used by the slayer." -Lucius Annaeus Seneca, _Epistulae Morales ad Lucilium_, Letter XXXVII:
Some arguments in favor of the simple life, l. 30. ca. 65. A.D.
trans. Richard Mott Gummere, 1917.}} {{crawlquote|This weapon falls into the '[[Long Blades]]' category. It is a one handed weapon.}} '''Eudemon blades''' are a blessed weapon, slightly stronger than the [[demon blade]] it was formed from. Like the [[sacred scourge]] and [[trishula]], it always has the [[holy wrath]] brand. You can create a eudemon blade through [[the Shining One]]'s 6* ability, or find them on [[angel]]s and [[daeva]]s. You can turn a eudemon blade back into a demon blade by using [[Kikubaaqudgha]]'s or [[Lugonu]]'s final ability to replace its brand with [[pain (brand)|pain]] or [[distortion]], though this is rarely a good trade. {| class="prettytable" style="border:none; margin:auto; padding:0; text-align: center" !
